metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9638 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: oggenc in vorbis-tools 1.4.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (divide-by-zero error and crash) via a WAV file with the number of channels set to zero.

criterions.comment: vorbis-tools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
